description:
Ryuusei is the top pop singer in the country. He is very successful and is also signed to http://anidb.net/ch40703 [Cosmopop]. http://anidb.net/ch5895 [Kyouta] idealized him before meeting him. Ryuusei tends to be egotistic and seems jealous of Kyouta`s emerging success, yet pushes him to do better (through his own methods and for unknown reasons).
Ryuusei is in the know about http://anidb.net/ch5900 [Misato]`s secret plans with Kyouta and appears to be her ally.
name: Ryuusei
